abstract: With Intel encroaching on its mobile device business, ARM Holdings has turned to I.B.M. and Samsung.
snippet: With Intel encroaching on its mobile device business, ARM Holdings has turned to I.B.M. and Samsung.
lead_paragraph: If you’re ARM Holdings, it’s nice to know that there are some companies out there willing to help you go to war against Intel.

headline.main: I.B.M. Lends a Hand to ARM

abstract: A.M.D. hopes that a new server chip called Shanghai can help it compete with Intel again.
snippet: A.M.D. hopes that a new server chip called Shanghai can help it compete with Intel again.
lead_paragraph: About this time last year, everything started to go wrong for the chip maker Advanced Micro Devices.

headline.main: A.M.D. Looks to Shanghai to Make Up for Mistakes
